answers.answer: Hello cnf1973It seems you are having some kind of peripheral neuropathy. Any similar history in the past? Is it increasing with the duration and the distance of the walk? Take some antifungal like ketoconazole under medical supervision.I would recommend take some mineral and nutrition supplement like omega 6 fatty acids and multi vitamin combinations. Do you also suffer from diabetes? If yes when did you last get your blood sugars done? How much have it has been?Answers to these questions would further help.Best,Take care

question: I have neuropathy in both feet due to back problems.  The third toe nail on both of my feet became cloudy and fell off.  It does not look like a fungus at all.  The third and fourth toes on both feet are sort of numb from the neuropathy.  Can this toenail problem be from the neuropathy?
title: neuropathy
